headline: How Edison International’s 6% Dividend Hike Will Impact Edison International (EIX) Investors
summary: Edison International recently approved a higher quarterly dividend of US$0.8775 per share, payable on January 31, 2026, raising its annual payout to US$3.51 per share, up 6% from US$3.31. This dividend increase, combined with analysts highlighting Edison International as a value-oriented utility, underscores management’s emphasis on shareholder income and perceived valuation support. We’ll now explore how this dividend lift could influence Edison International’s investment narrative,...
